name: andMatcher
javadoc:
/**
 * Combines multiple StringMatchers into a single AndStringMatcher.
 *
 * @param stringMatchers The StringMatchers to combine. May be empty, in which case this method returns NONE_MATCHER.
 * @return A new AndStringMatcher instance that combines all provided StringMatchers.
 */
improved_javadoc:
/**
 * Combines multiple StringMatchers into a single AndStringMatcher.
 *
 * @param stringMatchers The StringMatchers to combine. May be empty, in which case this method returns NONE_MATCHER.
 * @return A new instance of AndStringMatcher that combines all provided StringMatchers using logical AND operation.
 *         If only one matcher is provided, it is returned as-is without creating a new instance.
 * @throws NullPointerException if any of the provided stringMatchers are null
 */

name: charMatcher
javadoc:
/**
 * Creates a string matcher that matches any occurrence of the specified character.
 *
 * @param ch the character to match
 * @return a string matcher that matches any occurrence of the specified character
 */
improved_javadoc:
/**
 * Creates a string matcher that matches any occurrence of the specified Unicode code point.
 *
 * @param ch the character to match, represented as a Unicode code point (0-65535)
 * @return a string matcher that matches any occurrence of the specified character
 */

name: charSetMatcher
javadoc:
/**
 * Creates a string matcher that matches any character in the specified set of characters.
 *
 * @param chars the set of characters to match, cannot be null or empty
 * @return a string matcher that matches any character in the specified set of characters
 */
improved_javadoc:
/**
 * Creates a string matcher that matches any character in the specified set of characters.
 *
 * @param chars the set of characters to match, cannot be null or empty
 * @return a string matcher that matches any character in the specified set of characters
 * @throws NullPointerException if the input {@code chars} is null
 * @throws IllegalArgumentException if the input {@code chars} is an empty string
 */

name: commaMatcher
javadoc:
/**
 * Returns a string matcher that matches commas.
 *
 * @return A string matcher that matches commas.
 */
improved_javadoc:
/**
 * Returns a pre-configured string matcher that matches commas, allowing for efficient matching of comma-separated values.
 *
 * @return A pre-configured string matcher instance that matches commas.
 */

name: doubleQuoteMatcher
javadoc:
/**
 * Returns a string matcher that matches strings enclosed within double quotes.
 *
 * @return A string matcher that matches strings enclosed within double quotes.
 */
improved_javadoc:
/**
 * Returns a pre-configured string matcher that matches strings enclosed within double quotes, 
 * allowing for exact matching of quoted strings. This matcher can be used to match strings 
 * that are enclosed in double quotes, such as "hello world".
 *
 * @return A pre-configured string matcher that matches strings enclosed within double quotes.
 */

name: noneMatcher
javadoc:
/**
 * Returns a matcher that always matches.
 *
 * @return A matcher that always returns true for any input.
 */
improved_javadoc:
/**
 * Returns an immutable string matcher that always matches, effectively ignoring the input.
 *
 * @return An immutable string matcher instance that will always match and never throw a {@link NullPointerException}.
 */

name: quoteMatcher
javadoc:
/**
 * Returns a matcher that matches quoted strings.
 *
 * @return A matcher that matches quoted strings.
 */
improved_javadoc:
/**
 * Returns a pre-configured matcher for matching quoted strings, which can be used to match strings enclosed in double quotes ("...").
 *
 * @return A pre-configured matcher for matching quoted strings.
 */

name: singleQuoteMatcher
javadoc:
/**
 * Returns a string matcher that matches strings enclosed within single quotes.
 *
 * @return A string matcher that matches strings enclosed within single quotes.
 */
improved_javadoc:
/**
 * Returns a pre-configured string matcher that matches strings enclosed within single quotes, 
 * allowing for exact matching of quoted strings. This matcher can be used to match strings 
 * that are enclosed in single quotes, such as 'hello world'.
 *
 * @return A pre-configured string matcher that matches strings enclosed within single quotes.
 */

name: spaceMatcher
javadoc:
/**
 * Returns a string matcher that matches whitespace characters.
 *
 * @return A string matcher that matches whitespace characters.
 */
improved_javadoc:
/**
 * Returns a pre-configured string matcher that matches any Unicode whitespace character,
 * including spaces, tabs, and line breaks. This matcher can be used to split strings into
 * tokens based on whitespace characters.
 *
 * @return A pre-configured string matcher for matching whitespace characters.
 */

name: splitMatcher
javadoc:
/**
 * Returns a string matcher that splits input strings based on whitespace.
 *
 * @return A string matcher instance for splitting input strings.
 */
improved_javadoc:
/**
 * Returns a pre-configured string matcher instance that splits input strings into substrings based on whitespace characters.
 *
 * @return A pre-initialized {@link StringMatcher} instance for splitting input strings using whitespace as the delimiter.
 */

name: stringMatcher
javadoc:
/**
 * Returns a matcher for the given string.
 *
 * If the input string is empty, returns a default matcher (NONE_MATCHER).
 * Otherwise, creates a new matcher from the character array representation of the string.
 *
 * @param str the input string to create a matcher for
 * @return a matcher for the input string
 */
improved_javadoc:
/**
 * Returns a matcher for the given string.
 *
 * If the input string is empty, returns a default matcher (NONE_MATCHER).
 * Otherwise, creates a new matcher from the character array representation of the string.
 *
 * @param str the input string to create a matcher for
 * @return a matcher for the input string, or NONE_MATCHER if the input string is empty
 */

name: tabMatcher
javadoc:
/**
 * Returns a string matcher for matching tabs.
 *
 * @return A string matcher that matches tabs.
 */
improved_javadoc:
/**
 * Returns a pre-configured string matcher instance that matches tabs, 
 * allowing for efficient and optimized matching of tab characters in strings.
 *
 * @return A pre-initialized StringMatcher instance that matches tabs.
 */

name: trimMatcher
javadoc:
/**
 * Returns a string matcher that trims whitespace from input strings.
 *
 * @return A pre-configured string matcher for trimming whitespace.
 */
improved_javadoc:
/**
 * Returns a pre-configured string matcher instance that trims leading and trailing whitespace from input strings.
 *
 * @return A configured {@link StringMatcher} instance for trimming whitespace from input strings.
 */
